title: Lamar Odom's family says that he's recovering "mentally and physically"
text:
20:52   Twitter Share on Google+ Lamar Odom 's family says that his health is continuing to improve, a week after he collapsed at a Nevada brothel.A publicist for the NBA star's aunt JaNean Mercer said today (October 22) that Odom is making great strides under medical supervision, reports NBC News . 
© WENN "[Lamar] is beginning to gradually flourish both mentally and physically. His use of speech has increased and he's more cognitively responsive," a family spokesperson said. Odom was discharged from a Las Vegas hospital earlier this week to seek more treatment in his hometown of Los Angeles.Odom's estranged wife Khloé Kardashian has been at the athlete's side since his hospitalisation, with the couple calling off divorce proceedings yesterday.On Tuesday, Khloé released her first public comment to thank her fans and friends for praying on Odom's behalf. 
© WENN / PNP She wrote: "Under [the doctor's] amazing care, incredible strides have been made. You can never be prepared for an experience like this, but without the outpouring of love and endless prayers that Lamar has received and the strength I was given from my loved ones, it would have been difficult to endure."Thank you for your continued support. God is great!!!"The reality star's family members Kim Kardashian West , Kourtney Kardashian , Rob Kardashian , Kendall Jenner and Kylie Jenner have all rallied support for Odom on social media over the last week.
